sandypython.spec¶

sandypython.spec.getsattr(obj, name, getattr=<built-in function getattr>)[source]¶

Mimics the behaviour of the builtin getattr, but works for special methods while the sandbox is running.

Example:

with utils.ActivateSandbox:
    x = getsattr(object, "__subclasses__")
sandypython.spec.remove_dangerous_attrs()[source]¶

Removes all the methods not mentioned in the good_*_methods.py files.

sandypython.spec.replace_dangerous_attrs()[source]¶

Replaces all the methods removed by remove_dangerous_attrs().

sandypython.spec.stats()[source]¶

Prints some information which may be useful while tweaking the good_*_methods.py files
